import Leaderboard from './leaderboard' const Header = ({ difficulty, width, height, mineCount, functions }) => { const [handleDifficultyChange, setWidth, setHeight, setMineCount, initializeGrid] = functions const bsDifficultyCols = 'col-3 col-md-2 col-lg-2 col-xl-1' const isActive = (diff) => ( diff === difficulty ) return (
{ difficulty !== 'CUSTOM' ? :
setWidth(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="width" />
setHeight(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="height" />
setMineCount(Number(e.target.value))} type="text" id="mineCount" />
}
) } export default Header
